      • add

        protected void add(long _sortId,
       long _id)
            throws CacheReloadException
        Adds a command or menu to this menu instance. The method must be specific implemented by all menu implementations.
        Specified by:
        add in class AbstractMenu
        Parameters:
        _sortId - id used to sort
        _id - id of the sub command / menu to add

        CacheReloadException - on error

      • hasAccess

        public boolean hasAccess(AbstractUserInterfaceObject.TargetMode _targetMode,
                Instance _instance)
                  throws EFapsException
        Check, if the user of the context has access to this user interface object. First, the instance method checks, if some access configuration exists for this menu instance object. If the user has access for this menu, it is test, if the context user has access to minimum one sub command command / menu. If yes, the user is allowed to access this menu instance, other the user is not allowed to access this menu.
        Overrides:
        hasAccess in class AbstractMenu
        Parameters:
        _targetMode - TargetMode of the Command
        _instance - the field will represent, e.g. on edit mode
        Returns:
        trueif context user has access, otherwise false is returned
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • getTypeTreeMenu

        public static Menu getTypeTreeMenu(Type _type)
                            throws EFapsException
        Returns for given type the type tree menu. If no type tree menu is defined for the type, it is searched if for parent type a menu is defined.
        Parameters:
        _type - type for which the type tree menu is searched
        Returns:
        type tree menu for given type if found; otherwise null.
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
